name: Brute Force Credentials of single Azure AD user
description: Attempt to brute force Azure AD user via AzureAD powershell module.

input_arguments.name: username
input_arguments.description: Account to bruteforce. We encourage users running this atomic to add a valid microsoft account domain; for eg "bruce.wayne@<valid_ms_account.com>"

input_arguments.name: passwords
input_arguments.description: List of passwords we will attempt to brute force with
